description: Enhancement queue for multi-phase workflow tracking across agents

example-feature.title: Example Feature Implementation
example-feature.description: This is an example enhancement showing the queue structure

agent_history.notes: Implementation complete with TDD, PR #123 created
Code review passed, all checks green

instructions.adding_enhancement: Add a new key under 'enhancements' with a unique slug identifier
instructions.updating_status: Append to agent_history array and update status field
instructions.status_flow: BACKLOG → READY_FOR_DESIGN → READY_FOR_ARCH → READY_FOR_BUILD → READY_FOR_REVIEW → READY_FOR_TEST → READY_FOR_DEPLOY → DONE
instructions.blocking: Set status to BLOCKED and document reason in agent_history notes
instructions.integration: Hooks automatically update this file on subagent completion
